Title: Enshou Nihon Mukashibanashi
Description:
['Of the same kind of late 80s shows about old Japanese (sexy) tales. It is made of three short stories, introduced by a narrator. And there is a "live" action sequence at the beginning, that the narrator seems to look at before starting the tales. Released in 1988 by Alice Japan (Japan Home Video).', '
', '

(Source: AniDB)']
